comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: There's mention of a Madame Diska, Renee Ditza, Madeleine Rivoire, Andree Mery, in the cast for the Parisian Theatre in New York, directed by Lucien L. Bonheur, 1915-1916 season: books.google.com/books?id=-wFEAQAAIAAJ&lpg=PA43&o... Andree Mery: actresscards.webs.com/apps/photos/photo?photoid=1182696 FRENCH THEATRE'S AMBITIOUS PLANS New York Times 29 August 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10C16F93C5D17738... also mentions Mery and Ditza.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: This play, "Mlle Josette Ma Femme," reviewed 7 December 1915, included Mado Ditza, Madeleine Rivort, Jenny Diska in the cast; further down the column there's also mention of an actress named Minnie May Belcher, a member of the THeatre Assembly that visited Wall Street soliciting funds for the Actor's Fund. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FA081FF6385B17738... Another image of Mado Ditza: books.google.com/books?id=pu1LAQAAIAAJ&lpg=RA1-PA92&a...
